Hardware IDs for the device are as follows.. *'''PCMCIA\Siemens-SpeedStream_Wireless_PCMCIA-EA8E''' *'''PCMCIA\Siemens-SpeedStream_Wireless_PCMCIA-02AC-0002''' .. and the '''pccardctl ident''' output for the device is... 
Socket 0:
product info: "Siemens", "SpeedStream Wireless PCMCIA", "Version 01.02", ""
manfid: 0x02ac, 0x0002
function: 6 (network)
